ingredients: +   1/2 cup packed brown sugar,   +   1/2 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened, 1 large egg, 1 tablespoon brandy, 1   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1 cup dried cranberries,   +   3/4 cup white chocolate chips
